name: Branches (radzo73)
description:
A too-short game exploring parallel universes, and their consequences. Made for the Lospec Jam 1!

Controls: Arrow Keys to MOVE, Up to ENTER, Z (known as A) to JUMP, X (known as B) to BRANCH. Do the SECRET TECHNIQUE by MOONWALKING‽‽‽

CREDITS:

PeepingOwl: Sprites

JamesTDG: Font

radzo73: Game code

Godot: A good game engine

Thiago Amendola: A really good LUT shader for Godot
